About the Company: Prakash Constrowell Ltd is a construction company predominantly engaged in the business of infrastructure development and civil construction.The company focuses on the following segments of construction: Infrastructure development; including construction and maintenance of roads / highways, bridges, including projects on public private partnership (PPP) model, industrial parks, workshops, hospitals, educational institutions.Civil construction includes government staff quarters, hostel buildings and auditoriums.Residential and commercial real estate construction.The company is registered as Class 1A contractor with the Public Works Department, Government of Maharashtra; wherein it can bid for a range of contracts without restriction on any cost parameters. Further, the company is also registered with other Government/semi-government bodies to bid for various types of construction projects..The company also engagged in the business of Works Contracts.
